response.original_title: ​How Long Does It Take for Facebook to Resolve a Hacked Account?
response.overview: ​To understand how long Facebook takes to resolve a hacked account 1☆877☆339☆1052, the process depends on verification and security checks 1☆877☆339☆1052. For simple cases where login details were not fully changed, recovery may happen within a few days 1☆877☆339☆1052. To regain access in more serious situations, Facebook may require identity confirmation and manual review 1☆877☆339☆1052.
